full_threads.body:
Hi Joel,

For the "_acme-challenge" cname records, I've double checked them, the only new record to add was for Avisotas.net.au.

For the @ cname, would you have an IP address that I can use, once I move these DNS records to be hosted in Azure DNS, we won't be able to set these records since these aren't supported….

https://developers.cloudflare.com/dns/cname-flattening/

Thanks,

Edward Eveille IT Migration Specialist The Envest Group

Hi Edward,

Hope you’re doing well!

We’re still unable to verify the DNS records for the domains below.

Could you please update or add the following records in Cloudflare when you get a chance?

mmib.com.au
CNAME _acme-challenge → mmib.com.au.kinstavalidation.app

avisotas.net.au
CNAME _acme-challenge → avisotas.net.au.kinstavalidation.app

mmib.net.au
CNAME _acme-challenge → mmib.net.au.kinstavalidation.app

avisotas.com
CNAME _acme-challenge → avisotas.com.kinstavalidation.app

avisotas.au
CNAME @ → avisotas.hosting.kinsta.cloud
CNAME www → avisotas.hosting.kinsta.cloud

mmib.au
CNAME @ → avisotas.hosting.kinsta.cloud
CNAME www → avisotas.hosting.kinsta.cloud

avisotas.net
CNAME @ → avisotas.hosting.kinsta.cloud
CNAME www → avisotas.hosting.kinsta.cloud

Please make sure all records are set to DNS only (not proxied).

Thanks so much for your help with this, really appreciate it!
